posts.post_content:
I am looking to buy off-grade T206 cards ... need the cards to be in the FR to VG range ... mild creases, ink/markings and worn corners are fine ... so are pinholes but they cannot have more than 5% paper loss or hole punched ... i am paying $25+ per card for the common players and we can work on the HOFers and SL ... I need multiples of most of them ... send any questions, quantities and conditions to [url]akasc2@aol.com[/url]
